case.state: Sorry I'm late, milady. A kitty was stuck in a tree.

『{plagg}You're into this, aren't you?{!reset}』 A little. Well... more than a little. I could win with this. Could. 『{plagg}For such a sweet boy, you've definite got a naughty streak. What a perfect Cat Noir.{!reset}』

state.text: It's not the best hand... but I have better things to look at.

case.state: I always did wonder who was under that mask. Lucky it's a pretty, successful fashion designer.

『{plagg}Her feet don't smell as good as yours...{!reset}』 That's a... dubious compliment.

What're you thinking about, milady?

I like the way you look, with or without a bra... but you're welcome to surprise me by taking it off next, Marinette.
If you want to keep an eye on me, I wouldn't mind. Hands would be better, but I wouldn't mind.

I'm used to modeling like this... so... are you getting excited or nervous?
I can't take my eyes off you.
You're especially beautiful, Marinette. I hope you don't mind if I can't look away...

case.state: I might be further in the game... but somehow it feels like you're more exposed, Bugaboo.

case.state: You're really going to make me foot the bill for this, aren't you? 『{plagg}Sugarcube, why do humans like feet so much... is it the smell?{!reset}』

Marinette, you'll enjoy it if I lose, right? I mean, not that you want me to lose, but...

Annnnnything I can do to get you out of those underwear? I want to enjoy myself if I lose the next hand.

Now this is simply the best. But I think it'd be better if you lost this next hand!

『{plagg}Wow... oh no... really...? It's like Ladybug had no idea--{!reset}』 Plagg, that's a little thick.

『{plagg}I will confirm nor deny anything further.{!reset}』 Aww, Plagg, you do care!
『{plagg}I'll offer my truth to the highest bidder! Adrien, or Ladybug, who can get me better cheese, I wonder? Though this sock is heavenly.{!reset}』 Plagg, now's really not the time...

Mar-- Milady... don't go getting jealous... it's just part of the game. You can defeat Dealer on your own, can't you? It's nothing new for you... but... it's kind of hard to pretend there isn't more going on between us, right?

『{plagg}You're playing strip poker with Ladybug, Adrien! Wayyy toooo gooooo!{!reset}』 Y-yeah... b-but... we should still try not to reveal our secret identities....

『{plagg}It's suuuuch a relief to be de-transformed. Is this the part you reveal you already knew who each other were...? And hi, Tikki, great "voice of reason" thing you're doing.{!reset}』 I guess Plagg spelled that out...

I guess it's up to Adrien and Marinette to solve this one... Plagg and Tikki too. 『{plagg}The whole secret identity thing is no fun... unless you're a Kwami who knew the whole time! Moohoohahaha!{!reset}』

We're a perfect match, aren't we? ...We just undress in different orders... 『{plagg}I can't tell if people get more excited for: you or Marinette.{!reset}』Plagg!
Don't worry, Bugaboo. I'm not going to lose... though, technically, just playing this game with you really rings my bell.

I appreciate the attention, Marinette... but could we be a bit more subtle? 『{plagg}This whole lovey-dovey square thing is so confusing...{!reset}』

At least I lost almost as quickly as you did... I think keeping up the facade would've been really hard after a while... 『{plagg}But wait, Adrien, what about your secret identities-- etc, etc. Let them have their fun, Sugarcube.{!reset}』
You say that like I never let you win. It'd be boring if I was perfect all the time.
I'm sure the two of us can handle it. Let's have fun, and when the Akuma shows up, we can suit back up. Easy peasy.
What can I say? I'm just a natural at all things debonair. Don't worry, Marinette, I'm not going to let both of us lose.
Don't worry, Bugaboo. You're always there when I need you. I'm not going to let you down now-- you worry way too much!
I'm no copycat! Like my clothes, I'm all original... mostly. It just made more sense to take my button-down off.
What, you're not enjoying the view? Maybe my goal's to get an even bigger lead, Marinette.
I wouldn't worry too much about that. But... I'm glad I can keep things interesting for you after all this time.
It's not quite as good as a secret identity reveal, but you're pretty light on your feet, milady. It'd be a shame not to make you dance!
Don't worry, Marinette. We might have some extra fun now and then... but you're always first in my heart.
We can stop whenever you want... but no matter what happens, I want you to know we're absolutely a team first.
The feeling is quite mutual. I can't say I'm not tempted to just join you.
Well, milady, the honor is all mine. You're stealing the centerfold, anyway.
Well... I do have one last surprise.
This is how it should be, the two of us, neck and neck... or maybe just a handful of distance between us?
I'd never let you lose. Though I might make you lose this hand if you don't watch out!
Well, everyone was having so much fun looking at you that I figured I'd get in on the action.
Well, if I win the game you lose, that's just not okay. 『{plagg}What are you talking about!? That's twice as bad?! Even I know that!{!reset}』
What's another secret identity at this point? 『{plagg}What's up, Tikki? And besides, he's wayyy more distracting than your Miraculous-holder, Sugarcube!{!reset}』
So who runs this place, anyway? Is it some sort of robot, or magic, or what? Nobody ever seems to have their story straight.
I think he’s a bit of a switch.
Big, handsome guy with the charming Southern drawl?
I've actually really come around to camembert on a fresh brioche.
Well, I've got kind of a thing with this girl…
Uh… that's not a great question.
Not that it's your business, but… my mom and dad were always pretty busy.
I wear cologne, yes…
Yep. Can’t get enough of bluenettes, if I’m being honest, and I am.
Always. Are you, uhm, asking me out?

Chat as in... oh, oui, your viewers. Not Chat Noir Chat. Well, thanks. I don't think I'd qualify as “popular,” really…
Looks like you finally got me.
Well, I am a graceful winner.
Ooo... bad luck for me.
I'm not just swishing my tail. You'll get to see something good this time.
Well, time for a magic trick!
Well... check me out. Seriously, you'll love this!

state.text: This almost feels rude to be winning by this much. 『{plagg}Why? It's their fault for not playing better.{!reset}』
So... I do want to win, but if this isn't fun for the rest of you... 『{plagg}You're thinking too hard about this. What kind of hero just gives up because the other people are sad? Not you!{!reset}』

case.state: I should probably give you all a better view... 『{plagg}Yeah! I mean... wait, no, I don't want you to lose! What would that do to our frienship if I had to watch you jerk off?! {!reset}』
I'm ahead... but if I take more more off, I might distract the rest of you.
Well, I'm winning, so as much as I'd like to play nice...
I don't want to get overconfident. Arrogance isn't becoming, and I do want to be coming later.
『{plagg}Ooo... Adrien, you're still winning?{!reset}』 Don't taunt them, Plagg.
『{plagg}Do you think you could try a little less hard? It's so boring when you're good at everything.{!reset}』 I'm not trying to lose... I'm just doing my best!
『{plagg}You've been winning for a while, do you have your next thing picked?{!reset}』 Not quite... well...
I think I've kept you waiting long enough.
Well... it's no fun to win if you don't make some friends.
I've been enjoying the views.... I think it's only fair to share, huh?
As much fun as I'm having... I think we're all going to enjoy this next part.
Well... I'm not famously an underwear model. But... I am a model.
I'm still ahead... but this is really close! Mind if I get a little closer?
Well... there goes my last advantage.
You really kept this game close!
This has been really close. So... I guess we've all been looking forward to this.
Looks like this'll be a tough challenge. Don't worry, I'm always up to the test.
Ooo... it's already so close, and I haven't even taken off my belt yet. Speaking of...
Unfortunately, the suit doesn't come off in parts, so keep this a secret!
I'm a cat of my word. That said, I'm about to be a lot less costumed.

state.text: Lot of cute people here tonight... 『{plagg}The world is your charcuterie plate! ...Or at least the cheeses. At least at this ~background~.{!reset}』
『{plagg}So... who are you stripping for this turn, Adrien? Don't fixate so much on Ladybug, have some fun!{!reset}』 I haven't really thought about that, but everyone is pretty... pretty.

case.state: I'm not far ahead, but I'm also not far behind. So, I think I can make you wait a bit.
I guess the shoe's on the other foot... so why don't I take mine off?
I might not be suited up, but it's bad luck if you think I'll get naked just because.
Well, you almost have me onto the stuff I don't usually model... but...
Well, time for your bragging rights.
I guess it is getting kind of hot. Thought that might be the rest of you watching me.
The game's close! But... I think this next part should help me regain my lead.
If you like looking now... think of what I'll look like next!
I'm not out, yet... but I guess I'm about to be out.
I guess it's really time. At least it was pretty close, right?
I know I'm bad luck... but I can't believe I'm losing already...
Wait-- did I get tricked? I'm already losing?
...Hmph. I guess I'm already behind? Really?
Oh... I lost and I'm out of time. Great.
Well... that's perfect timing. Looks like I'm out of power.
Oh-- right. I used my Cataclysm before I got here... so...
This really isn't going my way...
I'm not used to losing, but I guess I don't mind that much...
Well, if you want to see me strip that badly...
Win some, lose some, I guess.
I'm pretty used to not getting what I want, so this is fine as long as it makes the rest of you happy.
If you wanted to see me naked, you didn't have to stack the deck this much.
This is going pretty well, I think. Aside from me losing.
Even when you lose, it's not so bad.
I'm a little flattered.
Come on, I'm a model. You think this bothers me?
Now this part is easy.
At least I know people're going to enjoy this.
Ah... the part where you get to see where I get all that confidence from!
Well... no sense in making you wait.
O-oh! Okay... then.
Well... I have to keep my Miraculous... so...
Don't worry, milady! I'm sure we're going to win this free and clear.
Oh, come on! It's hardly fun if we take out Deadly Dealer without some drama!
Huh? No, just that you don’t mind being a top or a bottom.
They remind me of bugaboo. You know, Ladybug.
...I'll take that as a no but… it's actually pretty hard to keep up.
...It's not the best smell… but Plagg loves it, and it just tastes so good.
She's strong, and focused, and creative, and kind, and… well, maybe if it were her idea…
Can you ask me literally anything else? Weird sex stuff? Personal secrets?
“It converts negative emotional energy into destructive force! It causes just about everything to crumble. And, no! It'd totally kill them!”
I feel like Cat Noir and Adrien Agreste are two different people sometimes.
No, no, let’s stick to English.
Well… maybe a few without my shirt on, but it was mostly marketed towards boys my age…
Well, I kinda did that for my dad too…
Um… Maybe I forgot some camembert in my pocket.
Lucky for you, my tail comes off. Nice and big removal, right?
I'll take off something suuuper big and impactful. How about my belt?
Plagg, claws in!
Detransforme moi.
Claws in! Don't worry, I'm plenty hot, but not actually on fire.
Hey, you got to see Cat Noir reveal his secret identity. I think I'm entitled to a few small things.
These shoes are pretty timeless... but I hope you all know I'm not doing this to stall.
I guess it's fine if I give you something a little big... or is that an oxymoron?
I'm still pretty toasty from wearing my costume. But... also from being in a strong, winning position. I hope this'll do.
As much as I want to prove Plagg wrong... which isn't very hard... my belt has to come off first. I'm a gentleman. I tuck my shirts in.
My shirt's tucked in, so the belt has to come off first.
I'm sure you're all really invested in my shirt coming off, but... has to be my belt first.
As much as I'd like to say I don't have a gym routine, running around rooftops is a great daily workout.
I do work hard to look this good. Moisturizing, saving people, being judged on my appearance...
So... even with that in mind...
I'm happy with my underwear but...
I know this is my last item, but...
So, I hope everyone's very clear that it's not what you have, it's how you use it.
Well, that's fine. I'll just start with my belt.
I thought this was going to be a friendly game of cards, but if you're going to push me, you'll find that this kitty's got claws!
This isn't really how I wanted this to go, but it's the big reveal you're all clamoring for...
So uh... it goes withouts saying what happens at the ~background~ stays at the ~background~, right?
I guess this'll do.
Hold your applause. I know you want more.
I think I can hold out just a little longer.
I know, I know. They're shoes. You'll get the rest if I keep playing like this.
...At least it's something small. It's not like you're going to spank me with this belt.
It's a small thing, sure, but think of all that you can do with a belt... you can keep your pants up, restrain someone...
Losing the game does bug me a bit. And not in the good, Ladybug way.
A compliment would be nice to hear about now.
...In all seriousness, I'm a little insecure, but I work really hard, you know?
...I'm... not the biggest, but I try my best.
I'm losing my underwear, but I won't lose my dignity.
Well... here I go!
Whoops! No take backs, right? Guess you're really going to have to be doing some saving tonight, Bugaboo.
Oops. I can land on my feet... but looks like I can't put that back on. What? They weren't as excited by the belt...
You’re definitely a switch. Oh, the things we can learn, 9S! The things we can learn, haha!
You say fixated, I say dedicated. ...I think some of the strongest women in my life have had blue hair. Thanks for the… uncomfortable realization.
Getting some really mixed messages.

...I'd kind of rather just do something a little more personal, though.
...I guess.
If Ladybug can’t deal with the akuma in your camera, I could give it a shot…
You'd be really surprised how rarely people actually just like me for me…
Kinda hard to talk when my mouth’s full, anyway, huh, McCree?
Um. I don't know that word, but I'm unhappy with the insinuation.
Uh… dark, much?
For anyone watching, I promise you, it's not just me!
I may not always land on my feet, but I always bounce back!
Hey, I'm feeling lucky. You can keep my staff too. You'll get to see my other staff later, if you start to win.
Aww, don't worry. You're getting more than my belt. You get to keep me here for a few more rounds.

『{plagg}Normally he lasts a lot longer than five minutes. There, now that you know I'm a great wing-Kwami, I'm Plagg, and this is Adrien.{!reset}』 It's nice to just be myself, I hope this is as fun for everyone else as it is for me!
I'm Adrien, and this is my kwami, Plagg. 『{plagg}I know, I know, you all came here to watch me strip, but I'm already naked. I'll see myself out.{!reset}』
If it makes you feel any better, I'll keep my ring the whole game. So, not too much left to get me naked.
Normally, I get paid money to look sexy and undress. You're all paying me in charm, though.
The classy, casual, boy-next-door look never loses its appeal, does it?
I'm a lot more confident when I'm Cat Noir... but just because I'm a little less flirty doesn't make me shy or awkward.
Tell you what, though. Next turn, it'll be something even better than my costume.
I promise that next round, it'll be even better than my costume.
If you think about it, you'll get to see twice as many people naked when I strip. Adrien and Cat Noir. Plagg too, if you're into that.
But, I think the finished look's worth it. Saving people, and looking good while doing it.
You can stare if you'd like. I'm used to having eyes on me. Play your cards right, and you might just get your hands on the authentic merchandise.
Is the bulge a little aggressive?
I know not everyone's into the big ones... but I hope this look is flattering on me.
I'm not exactly self conscious... but I'm not great at surprises... if you know what I mean.
So...
I sincerely hope you enjoy the view as much as I've enjoyed viewing the rest of you.
Fine. I'll include the staff.
Sigh. You're lucky I'm such a nice guy. I'll include the staff, too.
So... Adrien Agreste, model, superhero... 『{plagg}Adrien, I'm hungry. Do you have any cheese? Skip the intros and intro the foooooood!{!reset}』
Hello, everyone. I'm Adrien. Nice... game we have going here... 『{plagg}He's awfully charming for a man who forgot about a time limit on his powers... I'm Plagg. Charmed to meet you.{!reset}』
I'll get to the bigger stuff, eventually. But I'm not just going to roll over like this.
I'm good at plenty of stuff. I can't believe poker isn't one of them.
...Darn it. I could've said the shoe is on the other foot.
...I'm thinking of cat puns, now. So thanks for that.
...So, I might be a little submissive. What about it?
...Well, now I'm just going to spend the rest of the game thinking about that.

Hooo... somehow this feels like the stakes are really high...
The underwear is at least flattering, right?
I'm not exactly a big guy... but I care a lot... s-so...
At least it'll always be a snug fit.

I speak five languages, I’m a master-class fencer and martial artist, and with my kwami, Plagg, I can basically delete whatever I touch.
Garçons adorent never goes out of style...
Fashion requires you to be in touch with your feminine side too, ~name~. Maybe you'd like to get in touch with mine, too?
Take your time, ~name~... I'm only masturbating...

~Name~, won't you have pity on this poor innocent kitty?
Well, handsome?
Shame it's just all eyes on ~name~. I bet he'd love some hands too.
Don't worry, ~name~, we'll have you scratching that itch really soon.
Ooooo... bad luck, ~name~.
You better be careful, ~name~, most black cats that cross your cats are bad luck. Good thing it's just you and me, huh?
You don't have to try hard to impress me, ~name~. You can be plenty hard in other ways, huh?
I like your style, ~name~! I think I'll like seeing a bit more personality, too.

『{plagg}You should call him "king," you know. I hear that's all the rage.{!reset}』 I'm not really about rage, though. 『{plagg}It's... for a model you really don't know anything about the 'gram, do you?{!reset}』 The what, now?
『{plagg}Careful, ~name~! You're going to make his tail swish. And he's definitely not transformed!{!reset}』 Plagg!
Hey, ~name~, you're... you're okay with this, right?
Well, ~name~? I'm just happy to be getting to know you better!
Even if you lost the round, you're still a winner to me, ~name~.
I hope I'm not making you uncomfortable, ~name~. But... you know, I'm actually really excited to see what you're taking off next.
『{plagg}Don't go putting in the plug and cat ears yet, Adrien.{!reset}』 P-Plagg! He's cute!
Like what you see, ~name~? I feel like I'm about to. 『{plagg}Adrien, you can probably feel a lot more than your feelings if you ask nice... {!reset}』
Hé, beau gosse, qu’est-ce que tu caches là ?
I think we can both agree we're winning here, ~name~.
Am I...? Doing this for you, ~name~?
Garçons adorent never goes out of style...
Fashion requires you to be in touch with your feminine side too, ~name~. Maybe you'd like to get in touch with mine, too?
Take your time, ~name~... I only masturbated...
Hate to test your balance, but if you hurry it up... well, maybe I can collaborate with you?
I'm not in a hurry, but... I worked hard for you, ~name~. Well, in both senses.
~Name~, won't you have pity on this poor innocent kitty?
You lost before I did, Bugaboo? Bad luck for you.
Aww... don't go blaming this on a black cat crossing your path, you lost the hand fair and square!
Not so easy, is it?
Well, well, that about ties it up, doesn't it? Speaking of your yo-yo...
She's still more than in the game, Plagg... I'm not doing terribly, but... 『{plagg}It's called cheating, you know! You could *snort* finally unmask Ladybug... unlessssssss...!{!reset}』

At least Ladybug can win without losing her costume... we can't do anything about the Akuma if we follow the rules... 『{plagg}Rules schmooles. C'mon, don't you want to see who's hiding under that mask? I won't tell!{!reset}』
『{plagg}I guess you're never, ever going to know who she is under that mask, based on how you're playing...{!reset}』 That's... less of a problem than you might think...
『{plagg}Who knows who Ladybug could be under that mask... but with the way you're playing, you'll miss your only chance!{!reset}』 ...It's fine, Plagg. I uh... nevermind.
『{plagg}Wow, Ladybug's really leaving you out to dry! She gets this great view and--{!reset}』 Plagg, come on. She's the only one between us who can fight the Akuma.
『{plagg}Who knows who Ladybug could be under that mask... but with the way you're playing, you'll miss your only chance!{!reset}』 ...It's fine, Plagg. I uh... nevermind.
...Mari-- Ladybug, could we Lucky Charm our way back to the beginning and try this again?
Bugaboo, could we try to do this again... w-with a Lucky Charm, I mean. Please, Mari-- L-Ladybug.
The costume only makes this better... since you're not in a hurry or anything.
You're crazy if you think I've never thought of you in your costume... maybe we should try this pairing a bit more often, milady...
Well... I find it hard to believe you'd lose at this point... keep it up, milady!
You can win this, milady! It's only your first loss. Unless you want to quickly join me...
...Well, this was a fun date and everything, Mari-- milady--
Not exactly how I saw tonight going... but I guess we're going to see your secret identity... almost a shame we played up the whole "but who could they be under the mask!" angle...
Wait-- don't you have anything else?
Ladybug, is your transformation about to run out?
Do you have anything left? I kind of wish I'd kept my staff...
This is the big reveal, huh? ...Sorry, Ladybug. Don't worry. I can take care of the Akuma.
『{plagg}Well, well! Looks like it's time for the big reveal! You seem less than excited-- could it be you already--{!reset}』 Plagg, is now really--
Ladybug I-- 『{plagg}He loves you!{!reset}』 --I, I do but-- 『{plagg}He has loved you a long time, in your costume and out... frequently in his bed, if--{!reset}』 PLAGG!
I finally convinced you to join me, didn't I, milady? 『{plagg}It's almost like there never was an Akuma in the first place! Shocking!{!reset}』
『{plagg}Is this the part you two lovebirds fess up to knowing each other? Gag.{!reset}』 Aww, Plagg, don't be that way. Well, milady?
『{plagg}Oooo-- time for the big reveal, isn't it? It didn't quite cost you your pants but, who could it beeee?{!reset}』 ...Thanks, Mar-- L-Ladybug...
『{plagg}Could it be? Ladybug is really? ...I've known since like, month six or so. Haven't you?{!reset}』 ...I did have my suspicions but it's not like I...
You can already see so much of me. But... to see you unmasked? Totally worth it. 『{plagg}...This is romantic, but don't you two already...?{!reset}』
『{plagg}Fi-na-lllly... I don't find humans attractive but the suspense is ridiculous. Absolutely so, if Chloe is to be believed.{!reset}』 I... it'll be nice to see you. Well, the other you.
Took you long enough, milady... don't suppose you could make this into a strip tease for me?
Your timing couldn't be better...
Sorry, milady. At least you still have most of your clothes...
The Akuma... I... I'd lose my belts but... the Akuma...
Don't worry, milady, it can't get worse than showing your identity, can it?
Well... at least you're a far cry away from showing off much else.
It looks like I take the lead, Bugaboo.
This is sort of fun, even though I know how you got dressed this morning... it's more fun watching you take it off. And that now I'm winning.
Looks like we're about to get all tied up. And you didn't even need to use your yo-yo today.
Hey, we're about to be tied, huh? And to think, you let go of your yo-yo first. Poor me.
I'd let you wear my button-up as an extra layer, but... 『{plagg}That would be cheating, and cheating is wrong! Speaking of, do either of you mind if the other one...?{!reset}』
Looks like you don't need much support, Marinette, or I'd let you borrow my button-up! 『{plagg}Ooo... be careful, Adrien, or maybe someone else'll be supporting her!{!reset}』
You're welcome to take off more if you like the view, Marinette.
If I show off a little bit, will you take off something big?
I know you used to have a huge crush on me, but you're really crushing me this game...
I knew you would get kind of competitive but you're really kicking my butt over here, Marinette.
Don't listen to everyone else. It's not what you take off, but how you do it, right, Bugaboo?
Hey, don't go stealing the spotlight now!
I'd say you creamed me this game, Marinette, but I think I...
I'm already so spent and the best part's yet to come...
Well, at least you're not in your underwear yet.
On the one hand, it looks like you're not showing off the goods yet...
『{plagg}And my boy takes the lead! What do you think about that, Sugarcube?{!reset}』 Better be careful, Marinette, or you'll be out before me!
You're just letting me have the lead, aren't you? 『{plagg}Tikki, you better get fed and get her suited up or she's gonna lose!{!reset}』
Nothing super fun yet... but getting closer.
You think it'll be you or me who takes off our shirts first?
We took different routes to get here... but nice to see we ended up at the same place...
So good of you to match your outfit to mine, milady.
You better be careful, Marinette. I know a thing or two about overconfidence...
This is where it all starts, you know. First the shoes are off, then everything else!
Oh, I get it now. Jacket. Heh.
I thought I was closer to jacking it. But your jacket's fine, milady.
I'm holding you to that thing about your feet, you know.
Don't think I'll forget about you trying out your feet... but I'm fine with a jacket right now, too.
Don't worry, milady...
She might be losing layers, but I'm still in the fight.
You wore the cute ladybug bra, right?
I'm pretty sure you wore that cute ladybug bra...
You wore a cute bra at least, non?
Marinette, it doesn't always need to be ladies first, especially when it comes to the big reveals.
『{plagg}I'm surprised Ladybug didn't bring her purse, Sugarcube...{!reset}』 C'mon, Plagg, you spend most of your time in my pocket. Look how tight her jeans are!
I thought I was going to match my belt to your purse... 『{plagg}That's okay! I had a hiding place. Tikki's a little big to fit into Marinette's shirt, though. So tiny!{!reset}』
You know, I'd be happy to let you walk out of here in my shirt-- I just get to carry your jacket. Fair?
Let me carry your jacket, and you can wear my shirt when we're done here.
You know, you're a lot quicker on the uptake as Ladybug...
Good thing it's Adrien and Marinette and not Ladybug and Cat Noir... or you'd have already cleaned my mess up.
I may be out... but I do have the advantage of knowing what you look like without any clothes.
The rest of you should really be jealous of me. I get to see her naked every day.
Oh Marinette, I'm already spent. Looks like you might need someone else to help you...
If you wanted to have someone else help you... I think that might get me going enough to come rescue you...
Uh... Marinette, do you want me to look, or not look?
Wow, this is... do you want me to look away?
Sorry, milady... I can't help that I'm playing so well...
You know, at least you know one person watching you has totally pure intentions.
You know, I wouldn't mind doing a photoshoot with you like this...
Are you sure you'd never be interested in a photoshoot like this?
『{plagg}See, Adrien! Belts are valid. Her pants are going to fall off because she didn't think to wear one!{!reset}』 That's not why I wear a belt and she doesn't...
『{plagg}Sugarcube, you should've had your bearer wear a belt, because she's getting the pants beaten off her at this game!{!reset}』 Plagg, don't taunt Tikki and Marinette, please.
If we're being fair, I did lose my belt, too.
Clearly the solution was to wear a belt, Marinette. Not all of us love super skinny outfits when we're not suited up.
I know I make it look easy, but I'm getting pretty hard just thinking how you're about to look.
You know I'm not easy. I only make looking this good look easy.
You're invited to try the bra and jeans look more often, even if it's just for me next time...
I should take you to the beach more. I was really enjoying the jeans & bra style. You've got a great figure for it.
Careful, or we might have matching outfits walking home...
Be honest, would you mind if we wore matching outfits on the way home...?
I... I'm sorry, milady...
Well... if you don't mind me looking...
Oh the plus side, I already know how beautiful you are, so I get to see how much everyone else likes you.
I'll keep my eye on everyone else. I can always see you naked at home.
I didn't expect to still have my suit on when you got down to your birthday suit...
My costume might be skin tight... but your skin's going to be fully exposed... Sorry, Marinette.
You sure you don't want me to throw a few hands? This is fun but I won't even get to fully enjoy it if you lose again...
I always look forward to this, but... I'm wishing I could at least play with myself.
Say the word, Marinette, and I'd be happy to go again...
I think I'm going to enjoy everyone else seeing you almost as much as I do when you undress...
Say, you need me to rescue you, Bugaboo...?
Marinette... how do you feel about breaking a few rules?
Not the complete view, but I can't rely on you to handle everything for me, can I?
I hope everyone appreciates what they're about to see. Marinette takes care of most things, but...
The tension's been killing me...
Careful, milady... I might waste this.
You still feel the same excitement when we suit up, don't you?
I still get excited when we suit up. But... this never loses its luster either.
If you wanted to match up with me, don't you think a game of cards was enough?
You're welcome to try and show off, but I have to say I pioneered the chest and briefs look, milady.
Hey, gorgeous. Ready to really start showing off?
I think they've seen plenty of what I have to offer. You can steal the spotlight if you want.
You're not giving me a lot of motivation to keep winning, Marinette...
You know, I could lose a little bit. Like my shirt at very least... to keep things fair.
You already know that I like the way you look like... and taste... and feel... let's see what everyone else has to say.
This isn't a surprise to me, but I hope everyone else's going to enjoy seeing you naked as much as I do.
This has been close, but I wouldn't mind getting much closer to you, milady.
Milady... this has been a pretty fair match. If you want, I wouldn't mind... getting even closer.
You're having too much fun, aren't you, Marinette?
You're allowed to be a little naughty, milady, as long as I get to watch... or join in.
Well... normally I'd be excited for what comes next... but I think watching you with all these people...
I'm happy to see what comes next... or rather who.
I'm holding you to that thing about your feet, you know. Don't count me out... well, don't count me finished yet.
Don't think I'll forget about you trying out your feet... but I'm a little late for a jacket.
~Name~...
Well... ~name~... what am I supposed to say except the obvious...?
My lady, if you'd be so kind...
~Name~? Something... that makes you happy, okay?
I think we're both about to be enjoying the view.
I'm sure you're going with something impressive, right, ~name~?
May I take your coat, m'lady?
~Name~, time to strut your stuff.
Don't worry, ~name~, I'm more than willing to loan you one of my nine lives.
I've got your back, ~name~. Naked, clothed, stylish, or otherwise.
I've only got heart enough for Ladybug... but if you don't mind, I can have eyes for you, ~name~.
They say beauty is more than skin deep, but they also say there's more than one way to skin a cat. The point is that quips are pointless if they're not being said by me.
If you want some tips to undress with flair, ~name~, I am a model...
『{plagg}Adrien, you're sta-ring...{!reset}』 She's beautiful! I think it's hardly offensive... I hope.
...You know, you're really pretty, ~name~.
『{plagg}Adrien's not really bad with his words, but if the sounds coming from his bedroom are any indication, he's great with his--{!reset}』 Plagg! She's a lady!
Hang in there, ~name~! Don't worry. I may not have my costume, but being a superhero doesn't end when my powers do.
Am I supposed to look? Not supposed to look? I'm not sure what's the right thing to do here? ~Name~?
I've learned that the worst thing you can do is hide who you are. So, ~name~, I'll always support you.
She's really something special, isn't she? 『{plagg}Special enough to stand at attention? I don't get it, but it doesn't look like you will either!{!reset}』
Don't let me distract you, ~name~. You're the charming one here.
All eyes on you, ~name~. Or mine, at least.
This is still a bit new, I'm not making this weird am I?
I won't say anything about how pretty you are if it's only going to make you blush.
A tie, huh? Well... that's neat.
